title: CLDF Dataset derived from the Bahnaric data in Sidwell's "Austroasiatic dataset for phylogenetic analysis" from 2015
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Sidwell, Paul. 2015. Austroasiatic dataset for phylogenetic analysis: 2015 version. Mon-Khmer Studies (Notes, Reviews, Data-Papers) 44. lxviii-ccclvii.
